metadata.title: CVE-2024-8645 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
SPRT dissector crash in Wireshark 4.2.0 to 4.0.5 and 4.0.0 to 4.0.15 allowsdenial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-8645` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 4.2.6-1
libwireshark17t64 - 4.2.6-1
libwiretap14t64 - 4.2.6-1
libwsutil15t64 - 4.2.6-1
tshark - 4.2.6-1
wireshark - 4.2.6-1
wireshark-common - 4.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.6-1').
